item.content:encoded: I Closed My LinkedIn Account http://t.co/nMGL3wJZ via @chrisbrogan I just closed my LinkedIn account. Why? Because at least a MONTH ago, I reported a fairly simple problem: I can’t seem to add people back when they request that we connect. Oh, that would be about the 2nd primary thing one does on the site. You make a profile and then you connect. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Rush Limbaugh takes a ratings hit http://t.co/L2okSIJm Rush Limbaugh's ratings have dropped sharply in several major markets following the firestorm over his comments about Sandra Fluke, Politico reports. Limbaugh called Fluke a "slut" and a "prostitute" for her birth control advocacy, sparking condemnation from President Obama on down and causing many advertisers to flee his show. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Obama the Inchoate Kenyan http://t.co/9f3ZXdjt It is reasonable to believe that someone attempted to commit fraud in a commercial context when Barack Obama's literary agency published that he was born in Kenya. item.title: Bain Backfire: Obama Camp in 'Full Damage Control Mode'
item.description: Obama Camp in 'Full Damage Control Mode' Over Bain backfire http://t.co/LKw8yjbV #TCOT #Breitbart
item.content:encoded: Obama Camp in 'Full Damage Control Mode' Over Bain backfire http://t.co/LKw8yjbV #TCOT #Breitbart Today at the Chicago NATO Summit Obama told the audience:"[Bain Capital] is not a distraction, this is what this campaign is gonna be about." Meanwhile, back at campaign headquarters, Team Obama is in full meltdown mode after Newark Mayor Cory Booker went off script, undermining and mocking "what this campaign is going to be about." Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.title: "No NATO, No War": U.S. Veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan Return War Medals at NATO Summit
item.description: "No NATO, No War": U.S. #Veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan Return War Medals at #NATO Summit http://t.co/8YuPkbrC
item.content:encoded: "No NATO, No War": U.S. #Veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan Return War Medals at #NATO Summit http://t.co/8YuPkbrC We broadcast from Chicago, site of the largest NATO summit in the organization’s six-decade history. On Sunday, veterans of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars, as well as members of Afghans for Peace, led a peace march of thousands of people. Iraq Veterans Against the War held a ceremony where nearly 50 veterans discarded their war medals by hurling them down the street in the direction of the NATO summit. We hear the soldiers’ voices as they return their medals one by one from the stage. "I’m here to return my Global War on Terror Service Medal in solidarity with the people of Iraq and the people of Afghanistan," said Jason Hurd, a former combat medic who spent 10 years in the U.S. Army. "I am deeply sorry for the destruction that we have caused in those countries and around the globe." [includes rush transcript] Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: democracynow.org

item.title: 세상을 보는 다른 눈 "뷰스앤뉴스" - 검찰 "수백억 뭉칫돈, 노건평과 연관 없어"
item.description: 검찰 "수백억 뭉칫돈, 노건평과 연관 없어" http://t.co/0SA4QcMn 견찰들의 고약한 버릇을 어떻게 해야 고칠 수 있을까? 제버릇 남 못준다고 하지만 견찰들의 피의사실 공표는 나날이 도를 더하고 있다!
item.content:encoded: 검찰 "수백억 뭉칫돈, 노건평과 연관 없어" http://t.co/0SA4QcMn 견찰들의 고약한 버릇을 어떻게 해야 고칠 수 있을까? 제버릇 남 못준다고 하지만 견찰들의 피의사실 공표는 나날이 도를 더하고 있다! "고 노무현 전 대통령 형 노건평 씨의 자금관리인 계좌에서 수백억 원의 뭉칫돈이 발견됐다"고 공표했던 검찰이 21일 "일부 Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: New Data Emerges on Harms of Prostate Cancer Screening - New York Times Blogs http://t.co/PyZQyQmw #medicine In its final recommendations against routine use of a prostate cancer screening blood test, a government task force offered the most detailed breakdown to date of the potential risks and benefits of P.S.A. testing. Read more... Link - Trackbacks
